mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo (id,pw,nick,region,id_card, is_approved, joined_at) VALUES (#{id},#{pw},#{nick},#{region},#{id_card},#{is_approved},#{joined_at})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS ID, user_pw AS PW, user_name AS NICK, region AS REGION, id_card AS ID_CARD, is_approved AS IS_APPROVED, joined_at AS JOINED_AT FROM Userinfo WHERE ID = #{ID} AND PW = #{PW}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Userinfo WHERE ID = #{value, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
